tool_description: Sends automated and manual communications to customers via their preferred channels with template support.

communication_type.description: Type of communication (confirmation, update, resolution, escalation, survey)

scheduled_time.description: When to send the message (ISO 8601 format)

error_messages: Ticket not found: The provided ticket_id does not exist.
Customer not found: The provided customer_id does not exist.
Invalid communication type: Use one of [confirmation, update, resolution, escalation, survey].
Invalid channel: Use one of [email, sms, phone, in_app].
Empty message: Message content cannot be empty.
Invalid schedule time: Scheduled time must be in the future.
Channel unavailable: Selected communication channel is not available for this customer.
Template not found: The specified message template does not exist.
usage: Send communications to customers through their preferred channels. Use templates for common message types or provide custom content. Can schedule messages for future delivery.

message_id.description: Unique identifier for the sent message

delivery_status.description: Current delivery status (sent, delivered, failed, pending)

estimated_delivery.description: Estimated delivery time for scheduled messages
